text:
Timekeepers who perform no
manual labor on construction projects are not considered to be “laborers” or “mechanics”
for purposes of DBRA. However, if such workers perform other duties as laborers
or mechanics, they must be paid the WD rate for the particular classification
involved for the time so spent.
html: Timekeepers who perform no manual labor on construction projects are not considered to be “laborers” or “mechanics” for purposes of DBRA. However, if such workers perform other duties as laborers or mechanics, they must be paid the WD rate for the particular classification involved for the time so spent.
